function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmitted majorly through human-to-human contact","Impact":"Rapid spread of disease in urban areas with large gatherings","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technologies","People":"Urban population, travelers, commuters","Owner":"Health authorities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Need for anonymizing medical data to ensure data privacy and security","Impact":"Risk of breaching data privacy and security requirements","Mitigation":"Utilizing Blockchain technologies and quantum cryptography for secure data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Blockchain, quantum cryptography","People":"Medical practitioners, data collectors, smart city operators","Owner":"Data security experts, technology developers"},{"Description":"Integration of medical data with smart city operations","Impact":"Increased wealth of data but potential privacy and security concerns","Mitigation":"Use of secure data integration protocols and privacy-focused technologies","Technologies":"Data integration frameworks, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Data collectors, smart city operators, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Data privacy experts, technology integrators"}]}
